channel.title: Play GBA on pc
channel.description:
This may have been done before, so if it has...sorry for the repeat. (and this is my first tutorial and my second post on these forms) hope ya like it ;) oh and this is 100% mine, i didnt steal it anywhere
[b]Getting the Emulator[/b]
Go to [url=http://emulator-zone.com/doc.php/gba/vboyadvance.html]http://emulator-zone.com/doc.php/gba/vboyadvance.html[/url] and downlaod "Visual Boy Advance 1.8.0 Beta3": [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img174.imageshack.us/img174/8531/downloadhs2.png[/img][/URL]
(you can save the .zip file if you want but i find this way faster): [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img174.imageshack.us/img174/2742/downlaodig6.png[/img][/URL]
[i]Optional[/i] if you want (and i would recomend this) is that you make a seperate file named like "GBA" or "Gameboy Advanced" or something: [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img217.imageshack.us/img217/5521/foldernj1.png[/img][/URL]
Now its time to extract our .exe into our "GBA" file: [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img100.imageshack.us/img100/2849/extractionqp1.png[/img][/URL]
After you are finished it should look something like this: [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img201.imageshack.us/img201/3574/lookdk6.png[/img][/URL]
[b]Getting the Game (ROM)[/b]
Go to [url=http://nr.emuparadise.org/NewReleases/index.php?&direction=0&order=&directory=GBA%20Roms#]http://nr.emuparadise.org/NewReleases/index.php?&direction=0&order=&directory=GBA%20Roms#[/url] For the list of Roms scroll down to the bottom of the page: [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img166.imageshack.us/img166/2540/listpt4.png[/img][/URL]
I am going to download "2375 - Sonic Advance (J) (M2) (v1.1).zip ": [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img96.imageshack.us/img96/6633/downlaod1gp8.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img170.imageshack.us/img170/4109/download2rr8.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img149.imageshack.us/img149/4366/download3kv0.png[/img][/URL]
Now it's time to extract our game to to our "GBA" folder: [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img247.imageshack.us/img247/3280/extraction2as6.png[/img][/URL]
After all of that your "GBA" folder should look like: [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img152.imageshack.us/img152/8316/look2lx2.png[/img][/URL]
[b]Starting the Game[/b]
All you do is drag the .gba file onto the VisualBoyAdvance.exe: [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img172.imageshack.us/img172/4746/draguj9.png[/img][/URL]
Then a windaw will pop up and your game will start: [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img144.imageshack.us/img144/543/thegamelb8.png[/img][/URL]
[b]Default Keys:[/b]
* Button A - Z * Button B - X * Button L - A * Button R - S * Movement - Cursor keys * Start - Enter (Return) * Select - Backspace * Toggle menu - ESC * Speed Up Game - Spacebar
Congratulations!!! You can now play GBA games on your PC!!!!
(If there is anything that i messed up on please tell me so i can fix it)
